                                    Table of Contents



A.   Side-by-side of major tobacco control proposals.

B.   DoJ analysis of the impact of the proposed AG settlement on individual claims.

C.   DoJ analysis of class actions and the proposed AG settlement.

D.   CEAlTreasury economic overview.

E.   Treasury facts on the path of smoking and smokers over time.

F.   Treasury paper on lookback penalties.

G.   Senator Kennedy memo on federal claims for compensation from the tobacco industry.

H.   Kessler draft New England Journal of Medicine piece.

I.   KooplKessler executive summary.

J.   AMA executive summary.
